name: Chicken Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (392°F).
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the pizza base.
Add a layer of shredded chicken, onion, and capsicum.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese generously over the toppings.
Add chili flakes and oregano for flavor.
Drizzle a bit of olive oil on top.
Bake in a preheated oven for 12–15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

name: KFC-Style Fried Chicken
instructions: Marinate the chicken in buttermilk for at least 2 hours (preferably overnight).
In a large bowl, mix flour, cornflour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and salt.
Remove chicken from buttermilk, letting the excess drip off.
Coat chicken pieces in the flour mixture, pressing firmly for a thick crust.
Heat oil in a deep pan to 180°C (350°F).
Fry chicken pieces in batches for 10–15 minutes until golden and fully cooked.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot with ketchup or mayo dip.

name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, drain, and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté garlic and onions until soft.
Add blended tomatoes and tomato puree. Cook for 5–7 minutes.
Season with chili flakes, oregano, and salt.
Stir in fresh cream and mix well.
Add boiled pasta and toss to coat evenly.
Top with cheese if desired and garnish with fresh basil.
Serve hot.

name: Masala Maggi Noodles
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onions until translucent.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add peas, turmeric, and red chili powder. Sauté for a minute.
Pour in water and bring to a boil.
Add Maggi noodles and tastemaker.
Cook for 2–3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until water is absorbed.
Serve hot.
